game.name: Spinny Dungeon
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The slot machine roguelike. Each time you hit the SPIN button monsters creep closer. KILL 'em! LOOT 'em! EAT 'em! Focus on spells or synergies between symbols. Spin to DIE or spin to SURVIVE!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The slot machine roguelike. Each time you hit the SPIN button monsters creep closer. KILL 'em! LOOT 'em! EAT 'em! Focus on spells or synergies between symbols. Spin to DIE or spin to SURVIVE!
